summary: Herbie, the Volkswagen Beetle with a mind of its own, is racing in the Monte Carlo Rally. Unbeknownst to Herbie's driver, thieves have hidden a cache of stolen diamonds in Herbie's gas tank, and are now trying to get them back.
cast: Dean Jones|Don Knotts|Julie Sommars|Jacques Marin|Roy Kinnear|Bernard Fox|Eric Braeden|Xavier Saint-Macary|François Lalande|Alan Caillou|Laurie Main|Mike Kulcsar|Johnny Haymer|Stanley Brock|Gérard Jugnot|Jean-Marie Proslier|Tom McCorrey|Lloyd Nelson|Jean-Jacques Moreau|Yveline Brière|Sébastien Floche|Madeleine Damien|Alain Janey|Raoul Delfosse|Edward Marcus|Dick Warlock|Jerry Brutsche|Kevin Johnston|Bob Harris|Carey Loftin|Jesse Wayne|Bill Erickson|Regis Parton|Josiane Balasko|Giselle|Herbie|André Penvern|Katia Tchenko
title: Herbie en el Gran Prix de Montecarlo
